item.title: Moparisbest or Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:47, topic:398009”]I feel I have nothing to contribute to on MITB so I stay here. Once
Immsmart enough with coding and such I may go over there and try to receive some
Criticism on codes n such. Right now the only thing I could contribute to would be the general section. :D[/quote]
You can still contribute to something such as a forum. You could be an influence upon others in being respectful, making right choices, follow the rules, and last but not least; make knowledgeable posts. I think that’s what their biggest problem is (Moparisthebest) that a lot of the members expect the rest of the members to use grammar and such.

Nonetheless, using code to contribute to the community is nonsense. You can still make a difference with or without coding in this case.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparisbest or Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:40, topic:398009”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=495140.msg3620451#msg3620451 date=1307364584]

People at MITB like to discuss things that require research and knowledge so you can have a base for an argument. Generally why you get called idiots.
[/quote]I lol’d, research and knowledge…I never did that and got repped over there.

Rep doesn’t even matter so why even enter that as an argument? It doesn’t matter on MITB either.[/quote]I was saying that to show that you don’t have to do research or whatever to get “liked” over there.

Just if you go on mitb act completely the same, Just don’t take what they say seriously and you will be fine, Try not to rage as much as possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparisbest or Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

It’s not anything about really being “accepted”

The 30 or so posters on MITB are a close group of people to say the least, most of us have known each other for over 5 years(kaits, other RS cheating sites). Since we all lack lives and sit on IRC all day, we are all used to each other.

As long as people don’t come in and act like idiots there is no problem.

Read full topic

[/quote]Yeah, I plan on making some sort of transition over to MITB.

Good luck, it took me 4 years to get accepted![/quote]

Screw that lol

item.title: Moparisbest or Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

MITB used to be fairly active but has not been as active in the past two years or so. I would never come to MSCP until I was asked to become a moderator to help with it.

Now I use both sites. MSCP has way more activity, and what I’m here to do is chat. No point in waiting hours for a reply on MITB, so thats my justification for being here.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparisbest or Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Dtd15, post:32, topic:398009”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=495140.msg3620223#msg3620223 date=1307329876]

I find alot of MITB’s general discussion is intelligent articles. I fear of posting there, but I enjoy reading the finds.

No kiddin’.

So I started a good discussion, wow I actually did one good thing on Moparscape? I DESERVE A COOKIE.

Something like this would make them rage, or shoo someone off, count this as a prime example.
[/quote]

So basically they have no fun?[/quote]
No no they just rage a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparisbest or Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Dtd15 Dtd15
item.description:
@Dtd15 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:24, topic:398009”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=495140.msg3620096#msg3620096 date=1307323469]
they’re both the same to me. if you can have meaningful conversations on both, then why does one have to be better? yes there are a lot of pricks on mitb and yes there are a lot of idiots on mscp, but there are decent members on both forums
[/quote]
Sometimes, I see about four members or something the most active on that forum more, and I don’t think I’ve seen a lot more than four that are the most active, so I would state that their activity isn’t that great, but obviously a lot registered for just that forum.

No offense to those people, but they can be a bit snobby to outsiders.

Sometimes, I’ve had a little problem with a few members on that forum when I posted a music thread. So much for listening to new music as the board description states.

Hm basic question= Arguement :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:

This isn’t an agruement, we’re having a decent discussion here.

MoparScape is a lot worse. I don’t like how the general discussion board has been for these past few months. Other than that, it’s a place similar to Moparisthebest.com where nothing relevant gets done!

I can agree with a little of this, Moparscape’s general discussion board has become a little outrageous the past couple of months or weeks. This board has become a lot of pointless topics, and repeated threads etc., I understand but still.[/quote]

So I started a good discussion, wow I actually did one good thing on Moparscape? I DESERVE A COOKIE.

Read full topic
